OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center , WHO classification , International Prognostic Index score . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV , doxorubicin IV , vincristine IV day 1 ; oral prednisone day 1-5 ; filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously day 1-14 . Treatment repeat every 2 week 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Arm II : Patients receive cyclophosphamide , doxorubicin , vincristine , prednisone , G-CSF arm I . Patients also receive rituximab IV day 3 course 1-2 day 1 course 3-6 total 6 dos . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter .
